page.title: 04A farm worker's day.
page.content: In an interview with my uncle who works on a nearby farm I learned the following information. {Q.1. What animals do you have on the {farm? A.1. We have cows that are used for milking purposes, pigs and sheep, that are used for meat and fat and hens kept for their eggs. {Q.2. What are the main crops grown {on the farm? A.2. The main crops are barley, wheat, potatoes, turnips and grass (winter fodder and silage) { Q.3. What is involved in your {typical day? A.3. Around 5 a.m. I round up the cattle for milking. after the cows have been milked the milking parlour must be well cleaned out.
